meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tree</radical> from <radical>heaven</radical> with a <radical>mustache</radical> above his <radical>mouth</radical> valiantly crosses a <kanji>bridge</kanji>. This holy tree from heaven was sent down to earth to cross this very bridge. It is the tree’s angelic mission. Also the tree has a mouth and a mustache.
readingMnemonic: The tree finishes crossing the <kanji>bridge</kanji> and on the other side is a plate of steaming <reading>hash</reading> (はし) browns! That's why it has a mouth. To eat yummy bridge hash browns.
